title: Okuku River
text: The Okuku River is a river of the north <a href="Canterbury%2C%20New%20Zealand">Canterbury</a> region of New Zealand's <a href="South%20Island">South Island</a>. It flows predominantly south from several sources in and close to the eastern edge of the <a href="Puketeraki%20Range">Puketeraki Range</a> west of <a href="Waikari">Waikari</a>, flowing through a steep gorge in the <a href="Okuku%20Range">Okuku Range</a> before flowing into the <a href="Ashley%20River%20/%20Rakahuri">Ashley River / Rakahuri</a> east of <a href="Oxford%2C%20New%20Zealand">Oxford</a>.
